name: GetFolderMetadata
description:
Retrieve metadata template instance applied to a folder.

This tool retrieves the metadata template instance from a specified folder, excluding the root folder (ID `0`).

parameters.name: folder_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID representing a folder. Obtainable from the folder's URL, but not the root folder (ID `0`).

value_schema.description:
The unique identifier that represent a folder.

The ID for any folder can be determined
by visiting this folder in the web application
and copying the ID from the URL. For example,
for the URL `https://*.app.box.com/folder/123`
the `folder_id` is `123`.

The root folder of a Box account is
always represented by the ID `0`.

parameters.name: metadata_scope
parameters.description: The scope of the metadata template. It can be either 'global' or 'enterprise'.

value_schema.description: The scope of the metadata template.

parameters.name: metadata_template_name
parameters.description: The name of the metadata template to retrieve from the folder. Excludes root folder (ID `0`).

value_schema.description: The name of the metadata template.
